com.geoloqi.android.sdk.service
Class LQService

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.app.Service
              com.geoloqi.android.sdk.service.LQService
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks
public class LQService
extends android.app.Service

This is the primary service used by the Geoloqi SDK. When created the service will attempt to restore a saved LQSession and resume tracking.

Applications can instruct the service to pass commands to the tracker through the use of an Intent that declares one of the actions defined on the service class.

Clients can bind to the service using a ServiceConnection to access several public helper methods.

Copyright (c) 2011 Geoloqi Inc. All rights reserved.

Author:
Tristan Waddington

Field Detail

ACTION_DEFAULT

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_DEFAULT

When given this action the LQService will attempt to restore a saved tracking session or, lacking a saved session, will create a new anonymous user account.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_FOREGROUND

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_FOREGROUND

When provided this action the LQService will attempt to invoke Service.startForeground(int, android.app.Notification). A Notification must be provided as an Extra. This action mirrors ACTION_DEFAULT in all other ways.

This Intent requires that the following extras be included:

  • EXTRA_NOTIFICATION

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_SEND_PUSH_TOKEN

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_SEND_PUSH_TOKEN

When given this action the LQService will attempt to send the provided push token to the server.

This Intent requires that the following extras be included:

  • EXTRA_PUSH_TOKEN

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_SET_TRACKER_PROFILE

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_SET_TRACKER_PROFILE

When given this action the LQService will notify the tracker that it should begin using the given LQTracker.LQTrackerProfile. This is equivalent to calling LQTracker.setProfile(com.geoloqi.android.sdk.LQTracker.LQTrackerProfile) on the tracker instance directly.

This Intent requires that the following extras be included:

  • EXTRA_PROFILE

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_REQUEST_LOCATION_FIX

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_REQUEST_LOCATION_FIX

When given this action the LQService will ask the tracker to temporarily run in a higher accuracy mode. The tracker will attempt to get a point of sufficient accuracy and then resume tracking in the previously active mode.

The following (optional) extras may also be included:

  • EXTRA_ACCURACY
  • EXTRA_TIMEOUT

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_UPLOAD_BATCHED_LOCATIONS

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_UPLOAD_BATCHED_LOCATIONS

When given this action the LQService will attempt to immediately flush any batched location fixes to the server.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_UPDATE_NOTIFICATION

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_UPDATE_NOTIFICATION

When given this action the LQService will attempt to update the foreground notification with the given extras. This action will be ignored if the service was not started with ACTION_FOREGROUND.

This Intent requires that the following extras be included:

  • EXTRA_CONTENT_TEXT
  • EXTRA_CONTENT_TITLE

The following (optional) extras may also be included:

  • EXTRA_CONTENT_INTENT

See Also:
Constant Field Values

public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_PUSH_TOKEN
The active C2DM registration token associated with this device.

setSavedSession

public void setSavedSession(LQSession session)

Save the given session to shared preferences. The persisted session will be used when restarting the tracker.

This method will not swap out the session on the tracker. If you wish to immediately update the tracker, you'll need to make an additional call to LQTracker.setSession(com.geoloqi.android.sdk.LQSession).

Parameters:
session -

getSavedSession

public LQSession getSavedSession()
Get the saved session from shared preferences.

Returns:
the saved session; null if no session exists.
